Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: itisithecondesa
Reviews.Content: Looks clean on the surface but a roach doesn't show up on a dark colored carpet unless you turn on the light. I like the Wyndham chain but Super 8 continued to disappoint. I'd at least use a dust ruffle to hide a stained mattress....

Reviews.Title: “Kind of...”
Reviews.Author: VolkerS2
Reviews.Content: This is an average, old motel, worn but still carrying on like an old warhorse. The rooms were clean, the shower gave more than enough water, a nice change. Breakfast was well below average, no toast available, only one toaster for the packaged very small bagels. The internet worked most of the time, but not all of the time, quite a nuisance. But the frontdesk was responsive and courteous, even caring.

Reviews.Title: “While front looks a bit dark as you drive up, parking in back well lit, can park outside room,&great value.”
Reviews.Author: DOTTIEmae5
Reviews.Content: Dated, but very clean. Had a couple minor complaints, but addressed immediately upon report. Very conveniently located next to IHOP, which had great food & coffee. Someone in office 24/7. Some ppl walking on Vine st. But parking in rear & well lit. Coffee in office ok, but rooms had single cup pot only. Plan to suggest change on this, tho. Huge, clean pool-altho we didn't use. Great value. A bit hard to get to from both directions but uturns @ most lights legal. Shower worked great as did bathtub plug. Staff friendly & helpful. Breakfast typical sweet rolls.

Reviews.Title: “What a cockroach infested DUMP”
Reviews.Author: jade g
Reviews.Content: Our last night stay in Florida turned out to be a nightmare. All other hotels were booked, we found this one in a magazine and called without looking at it first. we were told they only had 2 rooms so we jumped on it...when we arrived we knew it wasn't the greatest, the area is undesirable and the sheriffs car in the parking lot was disturbing but it was non refundable so in we go...our first room was in the alley by the stairs, i asked to be moved...our next room was INFESTED with little bugs, i don't kow what they were but they bite...and im talking SWARMS of them...we called the front desk and they moved us to the "suites". Our friends were also moved to the "suites" due to the same bugs in their room. the suites were a joke...filthy, old and stinky....I was standing in the living area and saw a cockroach run up the wall...hubby killed it and as i looked away there were cockroaches on the carpet.....we killed what we saw....with nowhere else to go we put all our luggage up high and went to bed....i woke up to a cockroach IN MY BED!!!!!!! what a sh**hole...no apology from the front desk...the place needs to be torn down and rebuilt..i had to leave my luggage outside when i got home in hopes that anything i brought with me died from the cold.... DO NOT STAY THERE

Reviews.Title: “Hope You like "working girls"!!”
Reviews.Author: praterjack
Reviews.Content: We were going to stay the 16th through the 20th of October. Upon pulling in and noticing the imigration lawyers office, and the sherrifs car in the hotel lot we had second thoughts. Looking around most buildings went out of business. Which you wouldnt think you would see in such a tourist town. Next thing we notice is a half dressed girl in heels walking up and down the street. It didn't take but two mins and we see her take money from a guy and then walk towards the houses. So just do your self a favor and save and extra hundred bucks up. That way you can go to a real safe hotel like we did.DO NOT STAY HERE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Liked it”
Reviews.Author: kathiejmie
Reviews.Content: My friends and I stayed three nights in this hotel while visiting Disneyworld and Universal Studios (about half an hour drive from the hotel). We liked the rooms, they were clean even though a bit outdated. There's free wi-fi and breakfast (very basic though). There's a great Chinese restaurant across the street. The guy at the front desk was very friendly and helpful, gave us a lot of information about the area and how to get to the amuzement parks.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Yet October 5th 2011”
Reviews.Author: Tamara J
Reviews.Content: I'm not a picky person, and I know you shouldn't expect the Hilton for 32 Bucks a night, But this hotel is the worst ever. I've stayed in some nice Hotels for alittle of nothing, our sink was stopped up as well as tub, the T.V. said cable only offered about 10 channels, and complementry breakfast let's just say stale cereal and unsweetened juice. Do yourself a favor and find another hotel I stayed at the Travelodge in eastgate Orange they have a jacuzzi. Just don't go here. We stayed there October 5-thru 10th 2011 the worst

Reviews.Title: “not good even considering the price”
Reviews.Author: jonchaley
Reviews.Content: Breakfast here is white bread or Fruit Loops, coffee or juice. No cereal choice, not even a stale donut or bagel, let alone fresh fruit to eat. that's it. Bread or crappy cereal. Hotel is run down, needs a renovation.

Reviews.Title: “back again”
Reviews.Author: queenie1000
Reviews.Content: We visited this again in May 2011 and it was good again. Location is great, nice pool to relax after a warm day. The free breakfast is nice in the morning with coffee, juice, milk, cereals and bagels with packed pastries. Service was good again.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful staff and hotel!”
Reviews.Author: MALCOLMSMOMLuray_va_
Reviews.Content: this is the first time i stayed here and it has been absolutely wonderful in every way! the rooms were so clean and comfortable, the pool and grounds were so clean and well maintained, and the wonderful staff was so kind,caring, and helpful. they greeted you with a smile and treated you like a special family member. this hotel is a gem! i will be back and tell all my friends back home in tampa about this great place.

Reviews.Title: “we wont be back”
Reviews.Author: jodycook12
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the super 8 we were treated good by the staff, we desided to up grade to a bigger room.but during our stay there there was bugs crawling on our food and even in the bed.due to this problem we will not be comming back and should be given some or all our money back because of this problem.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: yossiwa
Reviews.Content: We came from Israel - a couple with 3 children. We had chosen this motel due to the reviews in Trip-Adviser. Everything was more than we expected. The room was clean and very convenient. The breakfast had a lot of kosher food (cereals & cakes) The pool was great. We will recommend this motel to all our friends how come from Israel to Disney.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant stay, good value”
Reviews.Author: wim_110
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a Suite for 3 nights with 3 adults. The Suite is large (2 bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, living room). Parking space in front of the suite. Nice swimming pool. Central place, supermarkets nearby and the parks a short drive away. The only small inconvenience I can think of is that the breakfast did not provide fresh toast.

Reviews.Title: “ok hotel”
Reviews.Author: straw71
Reviews.Content: hotel was ok, very average, rooms needed to be updated, stayed here two different times. first room needed a complete redo , the building was off by itself away from the other buildings. was clean but that is about it. the continenntal breakfast was a joke at best. cereal, and some prepackaged danishes, kinda sad considering the room was a nice size.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing place to stay! Would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: lahansard
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean. Also very convenient to the parks. There were several restaurants close by that my parents, who were traveling with us, could walk to while my son and I went to parks they were not interested in. We enjoyed it greatly!

Reviews.Title: “I liked it and would stay again”
Reviews.Author: fancy442
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay here, my first review. The front desk personnel was polite and professional. The pool was clean and refreshing. Didn't swim observed children having a great time swiming. The area reminds me of a clean suburban neighborhood. Both times I had a room, first double second single. I like the location, many restaurants, (some within walking distance) shopping and not too far from theme parks, in my opinion. Will stay a third time.

Reviews.Title: “Super 8 Kissimmee Suite”
Reviews.Author: Federa-Q
Reviews.Content: Comfortable. Staff nice and helpful Rooms cleaned everyday, clean towels which was good as there was a heat wave of 110+ Needed to spray the rooms with Lysol air freshener daily - once done, it was okay. Fridge worked. Stove - questionable - didn't look right. Did not use microwave. Breakfast okay. Laundramat very close. Nice area. Air conditioner was put to test due to heat wave - called room service and immediately someone came to take care of it etc...

Reviews.Title: “Champions Mud Bash 2011”
Reviews.Author: atmguy1
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice, quiet. restaurants next door. safe and secure location. The pool was inviting, the Continental breakfast was ok. that could have been better. coffee pot was small and not enough coffee. The room was comfortable and clean

Reviews.Title: “Really good budget motel”
Reviews.Author: Palamino2
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay at this motel. Room was clean and very big, 2 lge beds, table, chairs, microwave, tv and fridge. Even had a small bath which was fine for a soak after a long day at the parks. The bed & pilows were comfortable too. The staff on reception were all friendly and helpful. The breakfasts were ok - cereal, bagels, muffins and pastries. You could help yourselves to coffee all thru the day too. The pool was large and clean. Would recommend this motel if you are on a budget. BUT - there isn't a safe in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased With Our Stay!”
Reviews.Author: KatieD223
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous booking this hotel- I had never stayed at a Super 8, and with the great rate we got, I was afraid that it would be too good to be true. But, I was worried for nothing! Everything was fine- clean, nice, convenient neighborhood, and only about 15-20 mins to Disney. The staff was nice, and my kids loved the breakfast- juice, milk, coffee/tea, cereal, & packaged bagels, muffins, pastries, etc. It might be a little dated, but not bad, and like I said it was clean and nice overall. And you can't beat the price, expecially for what you get! Will definitely stay here again next time we're in the area!

Reviews.Title: “A Remarkable Value in this Day & Age”
Reviews.Author: Papa1_11
Reviews.Content: I was slightly apprehensive about a motel room that charged only $30. per night. I was very pleasantly surprised and delighted with a spotless, cheerful room, with daily maid service, a pool, and even free continental breakfast. I heartily recommend this chain to travelers on a budget who want a super value.

Reviews.Title: “excellent value”
Reviews.Author: manny033
Reviews.Content: we are frequent visitors to the Orlando area and will be making this place our first choice in the future. Excellent facilities and staff. Very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Very Reasonably Priced Motel”
Reviews.Author: paul3491
Reviews.Content: Clean and very reasonably priced motel. Nice pool. Great for Disney visitors on a budget who drove to Disney. Cinnamon bun type of breakfast was very simple but the breakfast still added value to the price of my stay. You could buy at least one Disney pass with the money that you save by staying here.

Reviews.Title: “It's a very quiet hotel. I would not hesitate to return there”
Reviews.Author: melinda0791
Reviews.Content: Nice place. Suites very clean. Very quiet. It's near of many restaurants, stores, banks and gas stations. Nice and friendly staff. We would not hesitate to return there.

Reviews.Title: “Great room, great service, great value.”
Reviews.Author: hotchihuahua
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice time in Kissimmee even though it was only for one day and night..We came to Florida for the Daytona 500 and fell in love with Kissimmee...we even said we could live there...

Reviews.Title: “Sleep in your car first!”
Reviews.Author: Ron0875
Reviews.Content: We read the first couple reviews and thought it sounded fine. We should have read further. We literally have the doors barricaded-I can't sleep as our "suite" smells, looks and feels like the location of a recent crime scene. It's not worth it at any price.

Reviews.Title: “Great service!”
Reviews.Author: nicvalju
Reviews.Content: I like to say that we luke the service and we will return .thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Got what I paid for.”
Reviews.Author: gibsons4life
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff was incredibly nice. We stayed in a 2 br suite. Very dated, but clean. Maids didn't wash dishes, which was odd. Also, coffee maker, but no coffee? Location was VERY convenient to stores and restaurants. Would stay again. Great off-season rates!

Reviews.Title: “good value.”
Reviews.Author: mnicolace
Reviews.Content: Room was clean. In fact, I always wipe out the drawers with the white washcloth (dampened) and always find I end w/ a dirty washcloth, but not in this case. There was actually not a bit of dirt on the washcloth after a thorough wipe. This really pleased our family, since we went "economy" on this trip, booked online, and was concerned about our choice of hotels. Negatives would be the pitiful continental breakfast- we ate out every day, and also not having a laundry right on site. I know a public 24-hour coin laundry is in the strip center next to the hotel, so not far to travel, but I had to stay w/ the clothes the entire time, which was inconvenient at 10 pm. Refrigerator was great (no noise, cold enough, etc). I would recommend the hotel to someone who was busy during the day- great place to stay overnight, but no frills. Good value.

Reviews.Title: “ENJOYED!”
Reviews.Author: HelenI43
Reviews.Content: The only 2 things that were a little disappointing is the fact of only 1 bath for 6 people and the continental breakfast. Nothing to eat gluten free..May I suggest corn flakes, rice krispies or something similar. PA travelers

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: dawebb
Reviews.Content: My wife and I grew up in the Orlando area and make frequent trips back to see relatives. We found the Super 8 in Kissimmee a great value that more than met our needs. Although not as close to attractions as some might want, the location provides a relaxing environment out of the tourist attraction chaos. More importantly, it is in a safe location well removed from areas of Orlando not suited for family viewing. We plan on booking additional stays in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable bed, lots of room,”
Reviews.Author: jdappraiser
Reviews.Content: Not a bad place for the price. Quite far from the airport and theme parks (35-40min drive). The room needed minor maintenace which was handeled quickly. Although dated, it was reasonablly clean. Very close to IHOP for breakfast and a small party store (same complex as the hotel). Would not feel safe walking around at night alone there. We only spent 2 nights to go to the theme park, and had 2 teenage kids with us, so this room gave us a lot of room to spread out and to put some drinks in the fridge, and leftovers to be heated up later. We just didn't feel comfortable letting the kids wander around alone after dark.

Reviews.Title: “excellent ,”
Reviews.Author: SMFULLE
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at super 8 for ages , my family and I enjoy the comfort and the price is reasonable......

Reviews.Title: “We always return to Super8”
Reviews.Author: Nany_nany
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in th e Super 8 a few times and we always enjoy it. The hotel is clean and the prices are very good. The rooms and big and comfortable, we normally get the room with the king bed and it has microwave and refrigerator. The hotel has a small breakfast with cereal, bagels, donuts, coffee and juice, it's a simple breakfast to start the day and it's free!!! Sometimes we go to the convenient store to get ham and cheese and put it in the refrigerator in our room and we can have it for the bagels later. And other times we walk to the IHOP restaurant next to the hotel and we have very good pancakes! I like gardening in my country, so when i come to Florida i like to see all the green and the trees and flowers, and the hotel has a lot of tree with the beautiful flowers and i love taking pictures to them. The address and location is good, maybe 15 minutes to Disney and very close to Best Buy, Walmart, supermarkets, etc. I always tell my family and friends that are going to Orlando and to Disney to go to this hotel, because for me is great! Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Don't Trust the Pictures”
Reviews.Author: kdddk14
Reviews.Content: After reviewing several sites looking for a cheap rate for my son and I for a baseball tournament, I settled on this hotel because of the pictures and hoping the negative reviews were just being overdone. No! The "suite" is one of the smaller rooms I have been in. The lights for the vanity and bathroom flicker and it is mildly clean. Room service doesn't come until around 4 p.m. Breakfast was comical with its two choices of cereal and packed donuts and danishes. Maybe I got what I paid for since the rate was low. The pool was pretty nice. Spend another $5 a night and go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Never again, pictures and information majorly misleading”
Reviews.Author: lauralock
Reviews.Content: I will never stay here again! I was a solo traveler, arriving 7pm to check in. The pictures led me to believe this site was in-door access, NOT! Well the suites were but not the overnight motel rooms that were a block away from the office. There was a man working in the yard that made me feel unfomfortable because he watched every move I made as I got out of my car and continued to watch my room after I entered. I found the TV had very bad reception and the refrigerator was not working. There was no ice machine working in this building, so I had to get back in my car and drive back down the street to the office to get ice! One would think the office would had asked if I needed ice to get it now before I go to my room 'down the street'! The office did offer for a maintence man to come to my room and make repairs on the frig and TV, I declined thinking it was that man watching outside. I cancelled my week long stay and went elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: queenie1000
Reviews.Content: Nice, large, clean rooms. Pool is great. Breakfast is a little poor. We only heard the neighbours on our last night - I guess some teenagers checked in for the weekend. We had a great time and the location is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Could use to be updated & cleaned better”
Reviews.Author: NANCE187
Reviews.Content: We went for one night because my son was a competitor at the Brazilian Ju Jitsu, and this hotel was close to the Civic center. We checked in and the place was pretty dead, our room was good size, but the ac wasn't on, so therefore the room smelled of mildew and the tub was half way full of water, I dont' know why but that didn't make me feel real good either. If it had not been that we were leaving early the next morning, I would not have stayed in that room because I also went into one of the kitchen drawers to get a spoon and saw a live roach! It was not very clean at all, if they knew they were putting guests in that room, they should have preped it more. I paid $80.00 for that room, checked in at 4 and out at 8am next day. Not really pleased.

Reviews.Title: “This is the place you want to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jenjuncosa
Reviews.Content: Thanks God We found this Hotel on hwy 192 after so many hours driving and passing so many other scary hotels... from the very first minute we walked in we felt so welcome... the ladies at the front desk were very helpful and also very nice ( something hard to find most of the times!)... we walked to our room and we were very suprised to find that we had Flat Screen TV ( woo hoo!!) not that we travel to watch tv at a hotel, but hey, that's a +!! The beds were soooo comfy!!! Fridge and Microwable came very useful when traveling with small children! and the cleanliness of the room was 5 stars! tha pool is big!!! my son loved it!!! We vere so happy on this place that we were sad to go home!! and all that for what we were paying... unbelievable!!! now we know were to stay on our next vacation!!!

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better.”
Reviews.Author: maduck11111
Reviews.Content: The staff were great do to our being later than expected. Our room was clean and quiet. The proplem came in the beds they were very uncomfortable. They where lumpy and seemed very well used. We both slept badley that night. We spent a whole day at EPCOT during one of the hottest days we have had in a long time. When we got back to our room the maid had turned off the a/c. At 12:30am our room was terrible. It took 4 hours for our room to cool down. With only a few hours sleep we left and checked out. We came home instead of finishing our little get away. Will not stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place for the price”
Reviews.Author: LarryNH
Reviews.Content: Nice room, friendly staff. Beware of 24 hour cancellation policy, my flight was canceled, I called immediately to cancel, and I was still charged.

Reviews.Title: “What a dump!”
Reviews.Author: BobA_10
Reviews.Content: grungy, old, outdated, poor TV reception; cable channels inoperative. Breakfast minimal and unappetizing. We will never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value.”
Reviews.Author: kcart00
Reviews.Content: My husband, our 3 children and I stayed here for 1 week while going to Disney. We used the room for sleep only since the weather was nice. It was in a centrally located spot which made travel easy and the IHOP next door was an added bonus. Service was good and the staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT VALUE AND LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: RNWWEB
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Super 8 in Kissimmee was great. The room was clean. The Hotel is centraly located. We would stay there again and would recomend it to our friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Wornout”
Reviews.Author: Bhavin69
Reviews.Content: The motel has plenty of plus points, but in a nutshell fails on the basics- Cleanliness- Room needed a deep clean- a/c vents filled with dust and crumbs etc... Fixtures/ fittings - Needs a new bathroom suite, and general fixtures. All have more than expired their lifespan. Internet- Weak signal

Reviews.Title: “Bargain Hotel”
Reviews.Author: RITravelingMama
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great value. Rented the 2 bedroom suite because of snoring issues. This allowed everyone to have their own room. The building itself is old, so don't expect anything fancy. It served it's purpose which was for sleeping only. The walls were a little thin and a lot of people who are going to Disney stay here, so if you like to turn in early and are a light sleeper, this may not be the place for you. The room had a full fridge, a stove, microwave, etc. A family could live in this place for weeks if necessary. For $53 per night we couldn't have asked for more.

Reviews.Title: “This is the perfect Hotel for you shopping or parks Vacations”
Reviews.Author: fmulino
Reviews.Content: My stay here was perfect, this place was all i needed, i went to the parks and shopping, so i use it just for sleep.. Is pretty cheap, clean, the location is very good, it has all I needed in my vacations... I´ll recommend this hotel to everyone...

Reviews.Title: “Great place for great value!”
Reviews.Author: seba77kpo1
Reviews.Content: I think it was awesome! Its price is great and the rooms are very comfortable! I recommend it to anybody who is looking for a stay in Kissimmee or close to Orlando and Orlando parks! My reservation was one of the Suites, and if I have to go to Orlando again I'm sure staying at Super 8 again. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: “Great but out of the main ways”
Reviews.Author: Teteriner
Reviews.Content: Nice, enough space and clean. But far away from the main attractions. Therefore nice staff, and good breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Dump”
Reviews.Author: charleshroan
Reviews.Content: The place needs painting BAD, the rugs need cleaning, and the Super8Start Breakfast is for the pits, would I stay again ,NO, I stayed in a "SUITE" with (2) bed rooms, coffee pot in rm, BUT NO coffee, lets just say, you should give me back my money. Ray Boggi

Reviews.Title: “It was perfect for our family. Totally awesome and spacious!”
Reviews.Author: bortjo
Reviews.Content: The staff helped us with everything we needed immediately. We will definitely be back. The price was well within our budget also. The pool was sparkling and a very refreshing way to end the day of site seeing. Everything was clean and well stocked.

Reviews.Title: “Another bit of the truth.....”
Reviews.Author: Lets-Roll4
Reviews.Content: When answering the question, "Would you recommend this hotel to a friend?" I must say I have more compassion for stray animals on my doorstep than the operators of this establishment have for travelers coming into this hotel. Sure, the help at the front desk is pleasant. But they let you know really quick that you'll have to wait til the manager comes in to take care of any concerns. And of course, when you visit Orlando, you don't have time to bicker with management, you're on VACATION.!. Our stay was for 5 nights and we could have changed hotels but that takes time away from VACATION too. Just a few things that were a problem for us: *bath faucet fixture was from the '70s, very hard to adjust water temp. *The wall outlets were loose and some worked and some didn't *Advertised as onsite guest laundry-the true fact is-it's down the street *Ice machine never had ice in it-checked for it every day and still had to buy it at a local store--$2.50 per bag *TV had a green tint on every channel-tried to adjust but no hope for it *Bad wireless internet * We had 4 people in our room and everyday we had to get a 4th towel and washcloth from front desk--housekeeping collects 4-should leave 4 *Bed mattresses are very bad-maybe 8 inches thick at most This is the worst problem I had for the week and I've seen other comments on this in other reviews. I went to the front desk about the nasty carpet in the room. Our two kids had just showered and were waiting around. Within 10 minutes, we noticed their feet looked black as coal. The front desk said they could shampoo the carpets that day but the floors would still be wet when we came back. PLZ,PLZ. This is not a problem that just arose, they know this establishment needs attention. Shame on us for staying the full length of stay at this place. I know you get what you pay for, but with the ammenities and the reviews I found while looking around the internet, they talk a good game. I really wonder what Super 8 would actually say about their name being on this hotel? But hey, Disney and Universal are great places to visit!!!!

Reviews.Title: “very clean”
Reviews.Author: sazbuff1
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for the money, a little out of the way if you are planning to do Disney, although we enjoyed being able to shop and getting to know that area better. Lots of places to shop and eat within a few miles. Microfridge was a big plus, WIFI didn't work all that well in the room we were in. We got it to work on the second night but not the first night.

Reviews.Title: “Super 8 Value”
Reviews.Author: Braveheart29
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a reasonably priced motel with good clean rooms - this is the place to stay. Pool and surrounding area kept clean - no noisy guests and situated near restaurants within walking distance - this is the place to stay. If you do plan to stay in the area for more than one night you will need a car to get around.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: dbn2004
Reviews.Content: We were traveling on a budget and read a good review for this hotel. So, we decided to try it. The hotel looked okay from the outside, the staff was friendly, it was definitely cheap BUT it was very old and dirty inside. Even though the hotel "attempted" a remodel, the carpet deodorizer was sooo strong (to hide other odors) and the bed was awful - hard as a rock ..... and VERY old interior.....(I wore socks all night - not to touch the floors with my bare feet - yuch !!!!) - I would only recommend this if you cannot afford anything else and....always, remember to ask to see the room BEFORE you give them your credit card. There are several other cheap hotels along HWY 192 / Vine Street- (Disney World area)

Reviews.Title: “cheap, night exceeds expectation”
Reviews.Author: ron57nie
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 quick nights at this location and for the price I was very happy. The rooms were old but well kept, lighting was good and the bed was comfortable. Shower and bathroom facilities were adequate. there was a small fridge and microwave. While a week would have been a long time the value was great for an overnight stay and we would do it again, given the same price, without hesitation. We paid $30 per night. the pool was large and clean and never used. the continental breakfast was poor with just toast, cereal and muffins offered with coffee or juice.

Reviews.Title: “Serves it's purpose and for a great rate!”
Reviews.Author: sungal06
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Super 8 with my boyfriend and his family for a trip to Disney World. It's no 5-star hotel but it totally serves it's purpose--clean rooms with decent beds and amenities. We had a room with 2 double beds. The pillows were a bit flat but I slept well. I wasn't a fan of the breakfast...some sugary muffins and honey buns, 2 sugary cereals, and some bagles. But I am a healthy breakfast eater, so that's just me. They had a nice looking pool but I didn't use it. Basically, a good location for your Orlando park vacation! I'd stay again at $50 a night!

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad If You Don't Look Too Closely. Sufficient For 12 Hours”
Reviews.Author: Fourseasondreamer
Reviews.Content: Our family of four traveled to this Super 8 to stay over night and get a jump on Disney the following day. Although it states that it is technically i close to Disney in real life it is quite far factoring in traffic and lights. The front desk people were friendly. The a/c worked. The crib was delivered quickly as were extra towels. They have tried to keep the place up with fresh paint and clean carpet. Still, you want to walk around in your shoes or socks so as not to touch the carpet with bare feet. Beds are miserably uncomfortable. Water smells like rotten eggs. Husband will not stay here again. I might with him but not alone. Pool looked clean. Breakfast was continental but plentiful. This hotel is sufficient for the 12 hour layover or the must stay cheap before going somewhere nicer but I wouldn't stay here for any extra time.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: omaredshark
Reviews.Content: I decided to take my wife to Orlando for the St. Valentine's weekend, I believe it was the right time to getaway from the city and take a few days off. We were pleased with the professional touch of the Hotel employees, their customer service and the smiles when we walked in which enhance our experience not to mention the super clean and nice room we spent the weekend. The effort to drive for hours really paid off. For the price, total quality of service including the breakfast, A MUST GO FOR ALL TRAVELERS. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Be careful about the price/rate!”
Reviews.Author: zanheltangia
Reviews.Content: Their online the rates matched the $29 on the website. I called in a reservation over the phone to book a room for the next night and they said $45, I went with it anyway thinking fees and and asked if that was the amount I was going to pay and she confirmed verbally again over the phone, but got there and they charged me $50+change. Maybe it would have been cheaper over the 'net? $20 dollars more than I wanted to pay for a little used room (I checked in at 11:30-ish AM, grabbed a shower which kept me there till noon left for a game and came back at 8-ish AM grabbed another shower and stayed till 10:30-ish AM). Other than that and the sugar ants around the coffee pot, I had no problems. Water pressure is weak but okay, and there was a pool outside of my door. When I got there there were only adults hanging around it. I am not going back there though, since my needs (a cheap hotel room to just sleep in before driving off again) are not worth $50. Hence why I originally picked this hotel, I was hoping to pay $30-35+change.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but”
Reviews.Author: Travellingdude2
Reviews.Content: Stayed during the Christmas holiday prices were high and rooms were booked up everywhere. The wifi worked fine in our room (not so in all of them) The sink stopper was not working properly and the toilet valve was bad (ie tanks was constantly refilling- noisy) I mentioned this to the front desk and the lady said she would have maintenance take care of it but she didn't write anything down. My wife thought the room wasn't clean. We were out of the room for a while in the morning of our checkout day and returned to get suitcases out of the room 20 minutes before checkout. They had deactivated our electronic key. Finally checked out. As others have said the breakfast is pretty basic. Bagels, toast, froot loops cereal. Won't be back.

Reviews.Title: “Good Clean Budget Stay”
Reviews.Author: traveliteVA
Reviews.Content: Glad I gave another Super 8 a try. Have always had fine experiences in Christiansburg & Blacksburg, VA, but after a bad experience last spring in Farmville, Virginia, I thought I'd pass on future Super 8s. Good thing cuz, this Florida one was another one for the "good" list. Had comfortable rooms - although old and worn looking especially in the bathrooms - low lights don't cover everything. Comfortable beds and passable breakfast. Security/police car on lot kept rowdiness away (possibly?) and the stay was much quieter than the Ramada at the other end of the street (Vine turns into W. Irlo Bronson at that point)

Reviews.Title: “Doing the job nicely!”
Reviews.Author: wnjmurphy
Reviews.Content: It's been a long while since somedboy has written something here, so I thought I would make a "work in progress" style review. I was worried about the comments listed here previously having had my hotel reservation changed from another place, however, I'm more than happy in the super 8. For the price most pay (i'm booked through someone else at a higher price) you are getting an absaloute bargain. My room, wireless internet, sink, fridge, microwave, TV with a decent array of channels, a hot shower, good lock on the door and the heating is good. If you want luxury, SUper 8 Orlando is not luxury, if you want simply a clean, comfortable stay with good facilities, this is a great place to stay! The only downside, the breakfasts, its not continental, or fresh, get yourself a tupperwear box, some milk, and some lucky charms from Wal-Mart or the discount supermarket over the road! Overall, I'm going for a 9/10!

Reviews.Title: “Not that great of a value!”
Reviews.Author: morrisfam02
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel through priceline and I was very leary about how it would be. I typically prefer 2-3 star properties. This property is definately deserving of a one star. Our first night, we got there at 2am which meant we had to check in outside talking through a glass window (safety was definately a concern). Since they were booked solid, we got the only room left and it had to be the worst room in the place. The only positive was that the beds were somewhat comfortable but the decor was drab and plain, the sink didn't work correctly, the bathroom was dingy, small and dirty and the mini fridge ran very loud all night. There were stains in the carpet and I was afraid to touch anything. The room didn't feel clean at all. The worst part was that I couldn't sleep (because I didn't feel comfortable) and I had to hear people (which I hope were not prostitutes) walking back and forth in high heels all night. Since this hotel was billed as a suite hotel, I ask if I could be upgraded to a suite room the next day, which they obliged. I had to pay an extra $177 for three nights but I thought it would be worth it. After a long day at Universal, I came back to the suite and once again, I was slightly disappointed with the condition of the room. It was definately better than the first room but the chain on the door was broken (it looked like it had been rammed and the kitchen wasn't that clean. The bathroom was absolutely filthy. The positive was the space. These are actually apartments that were converted to suites so it's a nice size but I still couldn't relax because it wasn't that clean. I can take my own dirt but not someone elses. Overall, this hotel ruined what should have been a fun trip to Disney. For those just looking for a place to lay their head it might be worth it but for those looking for a SAFE, clean comfortable room, beware!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay for the Price - Excellent Value!!!”
Reviews.Author: SpendthriftTraveler
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Super 8 for one night during a weekend trip to Orlando. We thought it was a great value for the money. We paid $50 including tax for a Saturday night. The lobby was clean and the front desk person was friendly. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel was quiet for sleeping that night and we had no problems checking out. There was even a microwave and small fridge in the room, a nice extra. If you're looking for the Hilton, with big fluffy towels, an in-room coffeemaker, and high-end shampoo in your room, this isn't the place for you. If you're looking for a good value, with clean, basic linens, comfort but not luxury, and a clean and quiet but basic room, we recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay that is never ending”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We are traveling in the U.S.A for 6 weeks, we started from Miami and then Kissimmee, we are due to move up to washington but we keep adding on nights to our stay at super 8 vine street. Its a fab motel, abit out the way from Orlando but its easy to get there by public bus, Lynx. You have to take a bus to Flordid mall bus 4 then take a 42 bus to international drive. You can get a day ticket for $3 per person. Back to the motel, it has all the fast food places you can think of around it, a big super market which is very handy as we have a fridge and a microwave in our room so we can eat healthy ish as if your a back packer you no its hard to eat healthy some times. The hotel says free breakfast - expect its a heart attact if you eat it every day as its normally cake or donuts???? The free bus to Disney is good but buckle up your seat belt as the driver they higher in cant drive to save his life - he knocks over walls ect! And if its a busy day it bus will be packed as it stops at other hotels in the area, but who cares its a free ride. Jen - frome somerset uk.

Reviews.Title: “Great deal, wonderful service!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place was reallly great. We got a two bedroom suite with a full kitchen for six nights. It had a queen size hide-a-bed in the living room. We paid $488 with taxes for the entire week. The pool is huge and is open til 11pm. There is a laundry mat right next door to do laundry. Parking is not right on street and there is security. Our maid was wonderful and honest!!!! The drive to Disney and Universal is about 20-25 minutes, but you get to see so much more of the town this way! Tips if you stay here: Breakfast hotel provides is packaged donuts, coffee, and fruit drinks. The suite kitchen comes with pots and pans, but no coffee maker or can opener, and bring an alarm clock because there are no clocks in the suite. All in all we had a wonderful stay here and look forward to doing it again in the future on our next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Not that bad for such a low price”
Reviews.Author: jimihat
Reviews.Content: Can't complain about this place, paid $21 per night!!!, nice clean motel, fairly basic but had TV with HBO and free local calls, ample free parking etc. The location is a little far away if you're planning to just hit the parks shops every day but we're only talking an easy 35 min (ish) drive to I-Drive so not the end of the world. The surrounding area is more residential than at the disney end of the 192. Good choice of chain eateries nearby, IHOP next door, the awesome Golden Corral is just a 2 min drive away. Would definitely stay here again as long as the price was this low!

Reviews.Title: “stay as far away from this place as possible”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It seems that the farther away from disney you get on 192, the worse the atmosphere. Got into the room and it was filthy. The windows and locks on the doors were all broken. The bathroom was disgusting. It seems that many of the locals actually take up residence at this place. I found this out when they all began to party outside there rooms at a very late hour. It was not safe to walk around this place at night because there were many shady characters also walking around. The 1 security guard didn't seem to care at all. To top it all off, the maid stole money out of my bag on the last night of our stay. DO NOT STAY HERE! Trust me, pay the extra 5 or 10 dollars a night to stay closer to disney on 192. You'll get a better cleaner room and a safer environment.

Reviews.Title: “Tired rooms”
Reviews.Author: dicknharry
Reviews.Content: OK for one night, but rooms are "tired". Towels are thin and microscopic - the first day I opened a towel to find an (albeit freshly laundered) elastoplast inside, the second day it appeared to have a footprint ingrained on it. The floor was not particularly clean and the bathroom needed redecoration. The bath had had some sort of bathmat glued to the bath and had sealant at the edges, so we stuck to taking showers. The fridge was very noisy too and the room was fusty. Breakfast was just coffee (no milk, just creamer powder), juices and donuts. Staff were fine, but the owner needs to invest some more money on it. Generally not good value for money, at least in Room 110!

Reviews.Title: “If Cheap and Clean are all that matters...this is for you!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Having benefited from the reviews from this site, I felt it was necessary to contribute after my trip. I recently came back from a business trip, where I had to pay for my stay, so I made sure my stay was dirt cheap and clean. Having read the other posts about Sup 8 Kissimmee and going along on those reviews, I have to say they are ALL correct. This place is dirt cheap $55/night after taxes, and clean. If this is all that matters than this place is for you. No roaches, no dirty bathrooms, or any other horror stories. I was also very surprised how cold it got in the middle of the night, considering I was expecting warmer weather in FL, since I am from NY, and was very glad the heating system made my room 90 degrees in less than 5 minutes!!! No joke!!! A+++ Once again, if you don't want to spend alot of money on hotel, but dont want to be stuck in an uninhabitable dwelling, then Super 8 Kissimmee will certainly live up to its name for you. Oh, and two more pieces of advice, DON'T sign up for (---) because these people are VERY SHADY. The prices are the same if you purchase them directly through the airline, hotel, and car rentals. And DON'T mapquest this hotel. Call the hotel directly for directions because mapquest will take you to the wrong Super 8!!!

Reviews.Title: “great deal”
Reviews.Author: Chicacherycola
Reviews.Content: We spent the last of June there going to WDW. There were 3 adults and 2 children in the party and we desperately needed some extra space from the normal 2 bed hotel rooms. This was so perfect. The childen had one room while my husband and I took the other and grandma slept on the pull out in the living room. We had the full kitchen to our disposal, but never had the time to use it. Housekeeping came in every day so the only thing we had to clean was what little dishes we had used. I would definately recommend this hotel to anyone who has a big party. It was about 15-20 minute drive to and from the parks, so not bad and the price is a lot cheaper than WDW.

Reviews.Title: “great price for two bedroom suite w/kitchen”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel October 2003. The motel is on the main street in Kissammee. It offers a two bedroom suite/ apartment style. A full kitchen with a microwave, full fridge and stove top. (no oven) The buildings are somewhat dated, although there have been attempts at refurbishment with newer furniture and carpets. The walls, windows and closets are old. (check your windows on check-in to ensure they are secure) The screen was out on one window...and that drew my attention to the fact the locks aren't secure and the windows could open very easily. We were moved to another room closer to the main lobby and the windows there seemed to be better. The Motel itself seemed well looked after and on close inspection of the pool it appeared clean. The suite was not clean to my standards, but still would return because of the great prices and the welcoming, ever accomodating, very friendly staff. (I'm particular, but practical, therefore, on my arrival I would clean the suite to my standards and go from there) Added bonuses are the Free Disney World Shuttle and continental breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value for a Very Big Suite!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I recently took the family to Florida to visit Disney World and stayed at the Super 8 Motel. Unlike most other Super 8 Motels, this one had suites which we enjoyed very much. The suite had a kitchen and living room, and two seperate bedrooms. We paid $49.95 which was a bargain considering the space that we had. We booked it on their website. Think the rate is normally about $79.95. The room was clean, comfortable and up-to-date. They also had a continental breakfast in the mornings and shuttle to Disney. We did not take advantage of these, but did eat a few meals at the IHOP restaurant they have on property. Also had a convenience store and laundry room on site, and was just a 10 minute drive to Disney. Overall, this property offered a lot more then you would expect from a typical Super 8 Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Super 8 motel Suites a super deal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the motel 3:30 am in the morning very exhausted with three children after making a three and half hour drive from Fort Lauderdale, Florida. We found our room for the first night very clean. We moved into a the suite which had two bedrooms, a kitchen, bathroom and a living room and was also clean and surprising had central airconditioning which allowed us to adjust the suite temperature to our liking. We found the hotel over the internet at ... and the web rates beat the rack rates by atleast 40 %. The motel staff was extremely helpful and polite. The location is not on the International drive strip, which we did not mind, but it was near all the usaul stores & shops, factory outlet stores and a flea market which we found very affordable. If you need a family hotel/motel at an affordable price only minutes from the attractions stay here you woul not be disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Apartment Suites, and Great Prices”
Reviews.Author: fazolis
Reviews.Content: We recently spent 7 days at the Super 8 Motel Kissimmee Suites. Unlike typical suites, theirs is layed out like an apartment-villa. It was very spacious and had a full kitchen, living room and two bedrooms. We were five adults traveling and found it to be very comfortable. We also liked the kitchen which allowed us to prepare a few meals. The hotel also has an IHOP restaurant on property which we ate at a few times and a very large swimming pool. The staff was very friendly and always guided us whenever we had questions or doubts about our holiday. The rate was surprising low, around $55, although I don't recall the exact price. We were able to obtain this rate by booking with thier website at abcsuites. We do plan to be in the area in March 2003 and will definitley stay here again. Also, they do have a shuttle bus to Disney theme parks, but we did not use it. It is about 10-12 miles from Disney, and we decided to drive ourselves, which was no problem, and gave us more freedom and flexibility. Cheers!
